posts.title: Strudel - Apple.
posts.body: Flaky phyllo pastry generously filled with apple and finished with a dusting of powdered sugar. Buttery, light and delicious.

posts.title: Strudel - Cheese.
posts.body: Flaky phyllo pastry generously filled with cheese and finished with a dusting of powdered sugar. Buttery, light and delicious.

posts.title: Strudel - Cherry.
posts.body: Flaky phyllo pastry with tart cherry filling and finished with a dusting of powdered sugar. If you love cherries, youâ€™ll be in heaven!
